title: Behold, He Cometh
verses:
Behold, he cometh with clouds descending,
Once for favored sinners slain;
Thousand thousand saints attending
Swell the triumph of his train.

Hallelujah! Hallelujah!
God appears on earth to reign;
Hallelujah! Hallelujah!
The Lord omnipotent shall reign.

Every eye shall now behold him,
Robed in dreadful majesty;
Those who set at naught and sold him,
Pierced and nailed him to the tree.

metadata.musical_notation: Present with treble and bass clef
metadata.theological_significance: Dramatic hymn of Christ's visible return in glory and majesty
